testcase.name: Verify Homepage Elements
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Technocrom homepage................................passed Then the user should see the header section.................................passed And the user should see the latest articles section.........................passed And the user should see the footer section..................................passed

testcase.name: Navigate to About Us page from Company header on homepage
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Technocrom homepage................................passed When the user clicks on the "Company" header................................passed Then the user should be navigated to the About Us page......................passed And the user should see the Company Profile section.........................passed And the user should see the Our Journey section.............................passed And the user should see the Mission Vision section..........................passed And the user should see the "Why Technocrom" section........................passed And the user should see the "Life At Technocrom" section....................passed And the user should see the "How We Work" section...........................passed And the user should see the footer section..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Resources Page
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Technocrom homepage................................passed When the user clicks on the "Resources" link................................passed Then the user should be navigated to the Resources page.....................passed
